Body:
Are the any open source tools/software libraries to convert an audio clip to its IPA representation? If so, are they accurate? If not, why not?

Here is a Gaelic word I wish to convert:

Ogg format:

  • Connacht Gaelic: http://www.focloir.ie/media/ei/sounds_ogg/tra_xthno_xna_c.ogg
  • Munster Gaelic: http://www.focloir.ie/media/ei/sounds_ogg/tra_xthno_xna_m.ogg
  • Ulster Gaelic: http://www.focloir.ie/media/ei/sounds_ogg/tra_xthno_xna_u.ogg

Mp3 format:

  • Connacht Gaelic: http://www.focloir.ie/media/ei/sounds/tra_xthno_xna_c.mp3
  • Munster Gaelic: http://www.focloir.ie/media/ei/sounds/tra_xthno_xna_m.mp3
  • Ulster Gaelic: http://www.focloir.ie/media/ei/sounds/tra_xthno_xna_u.mp3

Also how about phrases?

  • http://www.focloir.ie/media/ei/sounds_ogg/ar_bith_c.ogg http://www.focloir.ie/media/ei/sounds/ar_bith_c.mp3
Title: Convert audio recording of word to IPA representation
